mapper.select: select comm.com_no as comNo, com_category as comCategory, member_no as memberNo, (select member_nick from member_tbl m where comm.member_no = m.member_no) as memberNick, --멤버닉 (select member_picturepath from member_tbl m where comm.member_no = m.member_no) as memberPicturepath, --멤버닉 com_title as comTitle, com_content as comContent, read_count as readCount, com_date as comDate, com_like as comLike, com_filename as comFilename, com_filepath as comFilepath, (select nvl(count(*),0) from communityco_tbl co where co.com_no = comm.com_no) as cmntCount from community_tbl comm order by comm.com_no desc
